price: او له هغه څه يې ايساره كړه چې له الله پرته به يې لمانځل، يقيناً هغه له يو كافر قوم څخه وه.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
